name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
With a strong foundation in **Technical Sales** and **Communication**, I am a seasoned professional with 8 years of experience in engaging clients and driving market strategies across sectors. My expertise in **Market Segmentation** and **Pricing Strategy** empowers teams to effectively position innovative full-stack solutions tailored to client needs. As a Full Stack Developer, I bring a robust technical background, proficiently utilizing **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter** for seamless development across diverse platforms.
I have hands-on experience with modern frameworks including **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, and backend technologies such as **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. My deep cloud experience spans **Azure** and **AWS**, driving deployment efficiency and scalability. I've led the design of enterprise-grade platforms that incorporate AI/ML capabilities, enhancing predictive analytics and automation.
Committed to compliance, I have implemented applications that adhere to standards like HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2, alongside a strong proficiency in microservices architecture and CI/CD automation. I also possess experience in developing machine learning pipelines and MLOps workflows using tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
